changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.relationship AS SELECT rel.id, rel.name, rel.description, rel.preferred, inv.name AS inverse, rel.notes, rel.pinned, up.name AS updated_by FROM ruleform.relationship rel JOIN ruleform.relationship inv ON rel.inverse = inv.id JOIN ruleform.agency up ON rel.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.relationship OWNER TO core;
